author: Jeffrey Willis
comment: And they all looked the same. Id like to come back to this one day.

reply.author: NuDev
reply.content: Was it early in the morning? The time dictates the color. The hours corelate to red, the minutes corelate to green, and the seconds corelate to blue. Throughout the entire day you should see the entire spectrum of color.

title: All I got was blue and green

author: Ted Miller
comment: Brilliant concept but font is too small, even the time. Some color names are almost illegible, even when I wear glasses.

reply.author: NuDev
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. We will look into giving you a setting to adjust the font size.

title: Too small

reply.author: NuDev
reply.content: The time dictates the color. The hours corelate to red, the minutes corelate to green, and the seconds corelate to blue. Throughout the entire day you should see the entire spectrum of color.

author: Travis Craig
comment: What sort of wizardry is this?
title: Winning!!!

comment: Concept is good but font is to small to recognize the time.. Overall is better
